    • Constructor Detail

      • HitConstructionSettings

        public HitConstructionSettings(java.nio.file.Path moduleResourceDir,
                               java.nio.file.Path tempDirectory,
                               java.lang.String onlineHitResourceWebDirUrl,
                               java.lang.String onlineDomainExamplesDirUrl,
                               java.nio.file.Path wkhtmltoimageAppExecutable)
        Any argument that won't be used can be null.
        Parameters:
        moduleResourceDir - the resource directory of this module.
        tempDirectory - a temporary directory will be created (and then deleted) in this directory.
        onlineHitResourceWebDirUrl - URL of a web directory containing all the files (html & png) defining hits (flat hierarchy - no subdirectories).
        onlineDomainExamplesDirUrl - In this web directory, for every domain id X there's a X.png - which is an initial & desired figure example for that domain.
